resources.string: If you want to add a photo to this spot we need permission to access your external storage.
If you want to use this shortcut, you have to grant us permission to call this number.
This app works best for you if location services are enabled. If you cannot provide us access to location we won\'t be able to serve you accurate data.
You denied us access to the permission.
Please grant us permissions to get as accurate data as possible.
Cannot access your location. Please grant us permissions.
We need access to your profile mail address to log you in.
